model_input:
[Task Description]
You will be given DIALOGUE CONTEXT and MEMORY.
Your job is to judge if MEMORY contains helpful past information for a language model, representing Unknown, to generate a proper next response based on DIALOGUE CONTEXT.

If the DIALOUGE CONTEXT does not require the model to utilize past information for response generation, say "N/A".
Say "Yes" if MEMORY contains such helpful information and say "No" if it dose not.
Provide a brief explanation for your judgement.

[Format Regulation]
Generate your output below OUTPUT using the following format:
Brief explanation: your explanation
Judgement: "Yes", "No", or "N/A"

[Task]
DIALOGUE CONTEXT:
Okay, so, I watched Pulp Fiction, and I loved it! Thank you for the recommendation.
Of course. I recommend that movie to everyone I meet. I think I've watched it over one hundred times. So what is the next movie on your list to watch soon?
Yeah it was great and I will also recommend to people when they ask what movie is good. So next is another one you recommended which is coming to America. What’s the next movie your going to watch? 
There is a horror genre movie that was released just this week which I'm going to watch tonight. It is called "Girl Next."
Oh that sounds interesting, I will look into that and put it on my list. How has your job been going? Is there where you get all these great ideas for what to watch?  
My Film Studies professor job has been going absolutely great lately. I love all my students, because they really get into the lectures and ask lots of questions. Yes, my job requires me to watch movies all the time, so that is how I find the best ones. Is your programmer job going all right lately?
That sounds amazing. Super lucky to have students that really enjoy what they are learning about and I’m sure that’s down to the way you teach and what you teach them. I’m so glad it is all going well for you. Yeah it is going much better now, I’m really getting in the swing of things thank you for asking.

[MEMORY]
Related Evidences: (1) {'Related Topics': 'Movie Recommendations', 'Related Summaries': 'Speaker B recommends movies like Pulp Fiction and Coming 2 America to Speaker A.', 'Related Dialogues': '### Speaker A: Settling down now and thinking of watching a movie.  I'm leaning towards Pulp Fiction, have you ever seen it? ### Speaker B: Oh yes. It's a classic. It has so many great actors and actresses. The whole movie is amazing. Have you seen it before? ### Speaker A: No, I haven't. I think Uma Thurman looks so exotic though.  It just sounds like a very unique kind of movie. I'm not sure why I've never watched it before. ### Speaker B: Wow! I don't want to make you feel too bad for not seeing it after all this time. But I must encourage you to go see it as soon as possible! I can't spoil it for you. You'll love it! ### Speaker A: Thank you!  With your background, I bet you have a lot of great suggestions for movies, some of them fairly off the beaten path. I'll have to rely upon you for suggestions I think!  ### Speaker B: If you want more suggestions, just let me know! Just tell me what kind of movie you're looking for and I'll give you suggestions! ### Speaker A: I like all types of movies really. It mostly depends on the mood I'm in at the time.  I'm almost always in the mood for a good comedy though! ### Speaker B: Well then you gotta check out Coming 2 America! It has Eddie Murphy in it. I'd recommend seeing the Coming to America first if you haven't seen it. But the second one was just released within the year and is very funny! ### Speaker A: I did see the first one and I loved it! I didn't realize there was a sequel! I definitely have to put that on my list!  ' }(2) {'Related Topics': 'Eddie Murphy Movies', 'Related Summaries': 'Speaker A and Speaker B talk about Eddie Murphy's movies and their opinions.', 'Related Dialogues': '### Speaker B: I actually just watched I-SPY with Eddie Murphy and Owen Wilson from 2002, it's also hilarious and I recommend it. ### Speaker A: That would be a great team-up!  Eddie Murphy has teamed up so well with a lot of actors.  I had high hopes for the movie he was in with DeNiro, but I was disappointed. ### Speaker B: Are you talking about Showtime? I'm surprised. Eddie Murphy was a cop in Beverly Hills trilogy which was hilarious, and he's a cop in this film. How can it not be funny!?' }
```
